game.name: Good puzzle: Animals
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Good puzzle: Animals - this puzzle type puzzle game. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The images show a variety of animals
